petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Landlord demanded unlawful rent increases and failed to register property with Rent Stabilization Program

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Yes, through city correspondence requesting registration
rationale.issueDuration: Property unregistered from start of tenancy until February 2023
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Found rent increases exceeded allowable AGA and proper notices not given
rationale.impactAssessment: Tenant overcharged due to improper rent increases
